Description:
You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.

Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is completed, The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> blocks the Generator with the most progression for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the blocked Generator is revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>''' during this time.

You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.

Whenever a Generator is completed, The Entity blocks the Generator with the most progression for 20/25/30 seconds.

  • The Aura of the blocked Generator is revealed to you in white during this time.
"Nobody escapes us." - Pinhead

The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire.

Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> triggers ''Nowhere to Hide'':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' of your position are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds'''.

The machinations of the weak and craven draw your ire.

Your anger forces Survivors to reveal themselves.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator triggers Nowhere to Hide:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of your position are revealed to you for 3/4/5 seconds.

"Out with you, cowards! Show yourselves!" - Tarhos KovÃ¡cs

Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>Start the Trial with '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 Tokens</span>'''.
<p>Each time a Survivor is hooked on a '''Scourge Hook''' for the first time, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">1 Token</span>''' is consumed and the following effects apply:
*The Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with the most Progression explodes and '''instantly regresses''' by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">15</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''%''' of its maximum possible Progression.
*Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.
*All Survivors repairing that Generator will scream, but not reveal their location.

''Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance'' is disabled for the remainder of the Trial once all Tokens are consumed.

Overwhelming pain reverberates outwards.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.

Start the Trial with 4 Tokens.

Each time a Survivor is hooked on a Scourge Hook for the first time, 1 Token is consumed and the following effects apply:

  • The Generator with the most Progression explodes and instantly regresses by 15/20/25 % of its maximum possible Progression.
  • Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.
  • All Survivors repairing that Generator will scream, but not reveal their location.
Scourge Hook: Pain Resonance is disabled for the remainder of the Trial once all Tokens are consumed.

"The pain spills beyond flesh/darkness staining the horizon." - Girl in the Shadow by Carmina Mora

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

Each time you hit a Survivor other than your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' with a ''Basic Attack'', ''Save the Best for Last'' gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">8 Tokens</span>''':
* Gain a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">5 %</span>''' Cool-down reduction on successful attacks per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">40 %</span>'''.
<p>Each time you hit your '''''Obsession''''' with a ''Basic Attack'', ''Save the Best for Last'' loses '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">2</span>''' '''Tokens'''.
* ''When the '''''Obsession''''' is sacrificed or killed, you can neither gain nor lose any more Tokens.''
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time you hit a Survivor other than your Obsession with a Basic Attack, Save the Best for Last gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 8 Tokens:

  • Gain a stack-able 5 % Cool-down reduction on successful attacks per Token, up to a maximum of 40 %.

Each time you hit your Obsession with a Basic Attack, Save the Best for Last loses 4/3/2 Tokens.

  • When the Obsession is sacrificed or killed, you can neither gain nor lose any more Tokens.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"Death has come to your little town, Sheriff." - Dr Sam Loomis

After hooking a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Dead Man's Switch'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">20</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">25</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds''':
* While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> before it is fully repaired causes The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to block the Generator until ''Dead Man's Switch'''s effect ends.
* Affected Generators are highlighted by a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>''' Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

After hooking a Survivor, Dead Man's Switch activates for the next 20/25/30 seconds:
  • While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a Generator before it is fully repaired causes The Entity to block the Generator until Dead Man's Switch's effect ends.
  • Affected Generators are highlighted by a white Aura.

"I've seen the look on a man's face when he realises he's going to die." - Caleb Quinn

Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors' chances of survival.
* At the start of the Trial, the '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3 Generators</span>''' located farthest from you are blocked by The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">120</span>''' '''seconds'''.
<p>''Corrupt Intervention'' deactivates prematurely once the first Survivor is put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors' chances of survival.
  • At the start of the Trial, the 3 Generators located farthest from you are blocked by The Entity for 80/100/120 seconds.

Corrupt Intervention deactivates prematurely once the first Survivor is put into the Dying State.

"It shall be known across the land that the Gods curse the unfaithful." - (The Tablet of Adiris, 3.7)

Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology.

When you put a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> with your ''Basic Attack'', all Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">32 metres</span>''' of you instantly explode and start regressing.
*'''Instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''%''' of its maximum possible Progression.


Your eerie presence charges the air and interferes with technology.

When you put a Survivor into the Dying State with your Basic Attack, all Generators within 32 metres of you instantly explode and start regressing.

  • Instantly regresses the Generator by 6/7/8 % of its maximum possible Progression.

Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.

After performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Call of Brine'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">60 seconds</span>'''.
*The damaged Generator regresses at '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">115</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">125</span>''' '''%''' of the normal Regression speed and its Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.
*Receive a ''Loud Noise Notification'' each time a Survivor hits a Good Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> on the affected Generator.


Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.

After performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator, Call of Brine activates for 60 seconds.

  • The damaged Generator regresses at 115/120/125 % of the normal Regression speed and its Aura is highlighted to you in yellow.
  • Receive a Loud Noise Notification each time a Survivor hits a Good Skill Check on the affected Generator.

You form a psychic connection with The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> and alter the rules of the Trial.
<p>At the start of the Trial, '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 random Hooks</span>''' are changed into '''Scourge Hooks''':
* The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of '''Scourge Hooks''' are revealed to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr16" style="color: #ffffff;">white</span>'''.
<p>Each time a Survivor is unhooked from a '''Scourge Hook''', the following effects apply:
*The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">7</span>''' '''seconds'''.


You form a psychic connection with The Entity and alter the rules of the Trial.

At the start of the Trial, 4 random Hooks are changed into Scourge Hooks:

  • The Auras of Scourge Hooks are revealed to you in white.

Each time a Survivor is unhooked from a Scourge Hook, the following effects apply:

  • The Auras of all other Survivors are revealed for 5/6/7 seconds.

Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.
*Whenever a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is repaired to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">90 %</span>''', Survivors repairing it are faced with continuous Skill Checks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
*If they miss one or stop repairing, the Generator becomes blocked for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">18</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">20</span>''' '''seconds'''.

''Merciless Storm'' can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

Your horrible trauma is felt by everyone.
  • Whenever a Generator is repaired to 90 %, Survivors repairing it are faced with continuous Skill Checks.
  • If they miss one or stop repairing, the Generator becomes blocked for 16/18/20 seconds.
Merciless Storm can only trigger once per Generator per Trial.

You have got an ear for well-oiled gears.
<p>After a Survivor loses a Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, ''Gearhead'' activates for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':
* While ''Gearhead'' is active, a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> succeeding a Good Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while repairing reveals their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You have got an ear for well-oiled gears.

After a Survivor loses a Health State, Gearhead activates for 30 seconds:

  • While Gearhead is active, a Survivor succeeding a Good Skill Check while repairing reveals their Aura to you for 6/7/8 seconds.

"Sometimes a man's best work is what puts him in the grave." - The Prison Warden

A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength.
<p>After hooking a Survivor, ''Pop Goes the Weasel'' activates for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">45</span>''' '''seconds''':
*Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> '''instantly regresses''' it by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">-30 %</span>''' of its current Progression
*Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.

''Pop Goes the Weasel'' deactives after damaging a Generator or when its timer elapses.

A deep bond with The Entity unlocks great strength.

After hooking a Survivor, Pop Goes the Weasel activates for the next 35/40/45 seconds:

  • Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator instantly regresses it by -30 % of its current Progression
  • Normal Generator Regression applies afterwards.
Pop Goes the Weasel deactives after damaging a Generator or when its timer elapses.

Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

All Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> repairing a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from the following afflictions:
*'''Incurs''' the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' for the duration of the Repair action.
**If a Survivor was already suffering from '''''Exhausted''''' prior to ''Fearmonger'' affecting them, the '''Status Effect's''' timer will be paused and not recover for the duration of the Repair action.
**Both '''Status Effects''' linger for another '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''seconds''' after a Survivor stops repairing.


Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

All Survivors repairing a Generator suffer from the following afflictions:

  • Incurs the Blindness and Exhausted Status Effects for the duration of the Repair action.
    • If a Survivor was already suffering from Exhausted prior to Fearmonger affecting them, the Status Effect's timer will be paused and not recover for the duration of the Repair action.
    • Both Status Effects linger for another 3/4/5 seconds after a Survivor stops repairing.

You are fuelled by your hate for progress.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> applies ''Overcharge'':
*The next Survivor interacting with that Generator is faced with a difficult Skill Check<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.
**Failing that Skill Check '''instantly regresses''' the Generator by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''%''' of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.

After ''Overcharge'' is applied to a Generator, the following effect also applies:
*'''Increases''' the Regression speed from '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">85 %</span>''' to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">130 %</span>''' over the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>'''.

You are fuelled by your hate for progress.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator applies Overcharge:

  • The next Survivor interacting with that Generator is faced with a difficult Skill Check.
    • Failing that Skill Check instantly regresses the Generator by 2/3/4 % of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.
After Overcharge is applied to a Generator, the following effect also applies:
  • Increases the Regression speed from 85 % to 130 % over the next 30 seconds.
"It is a trap, But a trap one must step in..." - Herman Carter

Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> activates ''Dragon's Grip'' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30 seconds</span>''':

Your unmatched showmanship dazzles all.

When carrying a Survivor, Starstruck activates:

  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect while in your Terror Radius.

After hooking or dropping the carried Survivor, Starstruck deactivates:

  • The Status Effect persists for 26/28/30 seconds for any Survivor inside your Terror Radius at that moment.

Starstruck has a cool-down of 60 seconds once the Survivor is no longer being carried.

You make an example of one of your victims, forcing their allies to become awed by your power.
<p>Once you injure a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, if there is still a Dull Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> remaining on the Map, ''Hex: Face the Darkness'' activates and lights it, cursing that Survivor:
*All other Survivors will scream every '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">25</span>''' '''seconds''' if they are outside of the Killer's Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, revealing their Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2 seconds</span>''' each time.


<p>''Hex: Face the Darkness'' deactivates when the Cursed Survivor either enters the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or becomes Healthy<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, extinguishing its Totem.
<p>''Hex: Face the Darkness'' is disabled for the remainder of the Trial if Survivors manage to cleanse its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

You make an example of one of your victims, forcing their allies to become awed by your power.

Once you injure a Survivor by any means, if there is still a Dull Totem remaining on the Map, Hex: Face the Darkness activates and lights it, cursing that Survivor:

  • All other Survivors will scream every 35/30/25 seconds if they are outside of the Killer's Terror Radius, revealing their Auras for 2 seconds each time.

Hex: Face the Darkness deactivates when the Cursed Survivor either enters the Dying State or becomes Healthy, extinguishing its Totem.

Hex: Face the Darkness is disabled for the remainder of the Trial if Survivors manage to cleanse its Hex Totem.

The NE-Î± parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator applies Eruption:

''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex that toys with a victim's suffering.

If there is at least one Dull Totem remaining in the Trial Grounds, Hex: Plaything activates on a random Totem each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time:

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

*Survivors suffer from a permanent '''''Exposed<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect'''.


<p>''Hex: No One Escapes Death'' remains inactive if no Dull Totems are available.
<p>Once the '''Status Effect''' is revealed to Survivors, ''Hex: No One Escapes Death'' reveals the Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of its '''Hex Totem''' to all Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 metres</span>''' and gradually expands that range to '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">24 metres</span>''' over the course of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''All effects of the '''Hex Perk''' persist until its Hex Totem<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is cleansed or blessed.''

A Hex rooting its power on hope.

You are animated by the power of your Hex Totem when the Survivors are on the verge of escaping.

Once the Exit Gates are powered, if there is still a Dull Totem remaining on the Map, Hex: No One Escapes Death activates and lights it:

  • Increases your Movement speed by 2/3/4 %.
  • Survivors suffer from a permanent Exposed Status Effect.

Hex: No One Escapes Death remains inactive if no Dull Totems are available.

Once the Status Effect is revealed to Survivors, Hex: No One Escapes Death reveals the Aura of its Hex Totem to all Survivors within 4 metres and gradually expands that range to 24 metres over the course of 30 seconds.

All effects of the Hex Perk persist until its Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed.

"And the beast became faster and more powerful as if The Entity's shadowy whips were lashing at its back."

You have learnt the emotional weaknesses of the organics, and how to exploit them.
* Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, all other Survivors within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 metres</span>''' of them suffer from a '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">-20 %</span>''' '''''Hindered<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">10 seconds</span>'''.
<p>''Forced Hesitation'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">35</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">30</span>''' '''seconds'''.

You have learnt the emotional weaknesses of the organics, and how to exploit them.
  • Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State by any means, all other Survivors within 16 metres of them suffer from a -20 % Hindered Status Effect for 10 seconds.

Forced Hesitation has a cool-down of 40/35/30 seconds.

"THE ORGANIC MIND'S CAPACITY FOR EMPATHY GOES BEYOND HINDRANCE!" - HUX-A7-13

Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.
*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of Survivors attempting to blind you by any means are revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds'''.
*Grants immunity from being blinded from Flashlights<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Firecrackers<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, Flashbangs<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, and Blast Mines<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

Unlike other beasts of The Fog, you have adapted to light.
  • The Auras of Survivors attempting to blind you by any means are revealed to you for 6/8/10 seconds.
  • Grants immunity from being blinded from Flashlights, Firecrackers, Flashbangs, and Blast Mines.
"These monsters... they adapt! They emerge with strange new abilities." - Vigo, Vigo's Journal

Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>.

After picking up a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all Generators<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> not currently being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16 seconds</span>'''.

<p>''Thrilling Tremors'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Your dark designs and shrewd composure rouse The Entity.

After picking up a Survivor, all Generators not currently being repaired by Survivors are blocked by The Entity for the next 16 seconds.

  • The Auras of blocked Generators are highlighted to you in white.

Thrilling Tremors has a cool-down of 100/80/60 seconds.
"The night assists me and it's endless here." - The Ghost Face

Life has been difficult for you, so you will make it difficult for others.
<p>Performing the ''Damage Generator'' Action on a Generator<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> activates ''Oppression'':

<p>''Oppression'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">120</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">100</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">80</span>''' '''seconds'''.

Life has been difficult for you, so you will make it difficult for others.

Performing the Damage Generator Action on a Generator activates Oppression:

  • Causes up to 3 additional Generators to also start regressing.
  • Triggers a difficult Skill Check on all Survivors currently repairing one of those Generators.

Oppression has a cool-down of 120/100/80 seconds.

"Damn them as they would damn us." - Charlotte Deshayes

The cries of the unfaithful make your heart leap.

The cries of the unfaithful make your heart leap.

Whenever a Survivor is put into the Dying State by any means, all other Survivors within your Terror Radius will scream and reveal their current location to you for 4/5/6 seconds.

"Horror overcomes the heart of infidels who cry at the feet of the fallen." - (Hymn of Praise, 11.4)

Your ties to The Entity manifest when your prey attempts to get away.

*The Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of the blocked Vault locations are highlighted to you in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">yellow</span>'''.


Your ties to The Entity manifest when your prey attempts to get away.

  • The Auras of the blocked Vault locations are highlighted to you in yellow.

Like in business, you profit most when those around you suffer most.
<p>Each time you hook a Survivor, ''Leverage'' activates and gains '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">10 Tokens</span>''':
*For each Token, the Altruistic and Personal Healing speeds of Survivors are reduced by a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">5</span>''' '''%''' for the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">30 seconds</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''%'''.


Like in business, you profit most when those around you suffer most.

Each time you hook a Survivor, Leverage activates and gains 1 Token, up to a maximum of 10 Tokens:

  • For each Token, the Altruistic and Personal Healing speeds of Survivors are reduced by a stack-able 3/4/5 % for the next 30 seconds, up to a maximum of 30/40/50 %.

"The best way to raise profit is to cut expenditures. Cut everything!" - Adriana Imai

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

Each time you hook a Survivor other than your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', you gain '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''':
* For as long as the '''''Obsession''''' is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">2.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">3</span>''' '''%''' penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">22</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">27.5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">33</span>''' '''%''' or '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">11 Tokens</span>'''.
* The '''''Obsession''''' is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">33 %</span>''' Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

Each time you hook a Survivor other than your Obsession, you gain 1 Token:

  • For as long as the Obsession is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able 2/2.5/3 % penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of 22/27.5/33 % or 11 Tokens.
  • The Obsession is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent 33 % Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

"This isn't a man..." - Dr Sam Loomis

Whenever you are carrying a Survivor, ''Mad Grit'' activates:

*'''Pauses''' the ''Wiggle Progression'' of the carried Survivor for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''seconds''' each time you successfully hit another Survivor.

Whenever you are carrying a Survivor, Mad Grit activates:
  • Removes the Cool-down of missed Basic Attacks.
  • Pauses the Wiggle Progression of the carried Survivor for 2/3/4 seconds each time you successfully hit another Survivor.
"There's no getting out of this now. We're too good at it." - The Legion

Survivors who exit a Locker suffer from the following afflictions:

"This is no place for cowards." - The Legion

<p>
* When hooking a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, all other Injured Survivors suffer from the '''''Haemorrhage<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">45 seconds</span>'''.

Blood Echo can only be triggered once every 80/70/60 seconds.

"Attack an enemy with precision and their allies will feel it." - Renjiro's Doctrine 6:3

You seek retribution on those who have wronged you.
<p>
*Any Survivor who blinds you or stuns you using a Pallet<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> or a Locker<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> becomes the '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>'''''.
*Anytime your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' switches to another Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> by any means, that Survivor then suffers from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">50</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">60</span>''' '''seconds''' and their Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4 seconds</span>'''.

You know how to brutalise one member of a team to cause a panic.

Hysteria has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

"Sorry I got a little jumpy there. Didn't know quite what to expect." - Robert Kendo

You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.

Just knowing you are near is enough to disturb your victims.
<p>Survivors within your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> suffer from inefficiency:
*When using an Item<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, its Depletion rate is increased by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">80</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">90</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">100</span>''' '''%'''.

Just knowing you are near is enough to disturb your victims.

Survivors within your Terror Radius suffer from inefficiency:

  • When using an Item, its Depletion rate is increased by 80/90/100 %.
"Shit!! I dropped the gauze!"

The Land of the Shadows subsumes all. Healing only delays the inevitable.
*Whenever a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> performs a Healing action while they are inside your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>, that Survivor suffers from the '''''Blindness<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' and '''''Exhausted<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effects'''
*These effects linger for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">8</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">10</span>''' '''seconds''' after the Healing action is interrupted by any means.

The Land of the Shadows subsumes all. Healing only delays the inevitable.
  • Whenever a Survivor performs a Healing action while they are inside your Terror Radius, that Survivor suffers from the Blindness and Exhausted Status Effects
  • These effects linger for 6/8/10 seconds after the Healing action is interrupted by any means.
"Do not admit to fear, or pain, or doubt. These are the seeds from which darkness grows." - Otto Stamper

Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.
* Pools of Blood<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> are shown in '''<span class="luaClr clr clr19" style="color: #ff0000;">bright red</span>''' and can be tracked for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''seconds''' longer than normal.

Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.
  • Pools of Blood are shown in bright red and can be tracked for 2/3/4 seconds longer than normal.

"Pebbles shimmering in the moonlight; my life drips down in a trail so easy to follow."

Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.
<p>Whenever a Survivor heals another Survivor for the equivalent of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1</span>''' Health State<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> at least '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">32 metres</span>''' away from you, ''Deathbound'' activates:
* Causes the Survivor to scream and trigger a ''Loud Noise Notification''.
* For the next '''<span class="luaClr clr clr8" style="color: #d41c1c;">60 seconds</span>''', the Survivor suffers from the '''''Oblivious<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' whenever they are farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">16</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">12</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''metres''' from the healed Survivor.

Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.

Whenever a Survivor heals another Survivor for the equivalent of 1 Health State at least 32 metres away from you, Deathbound activates:

  • Causes the Survivor to scream and trigger a Loud Noise Notification.
  • For the next 60 seconds, the Survivor suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect whenever they are farther than 16/12/8 metres from the healed Survivor.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability and your ingenious modifications to Hooks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> alert you of tampering.
* Gain a ''Loud Noise Notification'' whenever a Survivor<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> begins sabotaging a Hook.
* While carrying a Survivor, see the Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of any Survivor within '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''metres''' of any Hook.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability and your ingenious modifications to Hooks alert you of tampering.
  • Gain a Loud Noise Notification whenever a Survivor begins sabotaging a Hook.
  • While carrying a Survivor, see the Aura of any Survivor within 2/4/6 metres of any Hook.

"No excuses, no equivocations... No crying." - Amanda Young

You become '''''obsessed''''' with one Survivor.

You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.

Each time you hook your '''''Obsession<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''', you gain '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">1 Token</span>''', up to a maximum of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">2</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">3</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">4</span>''' '''Tokens''':
* While in a Chase, your Terror Radius<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is reduced by '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">4 metres</span>''' per accumulated Token.
* When a Survivor rescues the '''''Obsession''''' from the Hook, that Survivor will become the new '''''Obsession'''''.
<p>''You can only be '''obsessed''' with one Survivor at a time.''

You become obsessed with one Survivor.

You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.
Each time you hook your Obsession, you gain 1 Token, up to a maximum of 2/3/4 Tokens:

  • While in a Chase, your Terror Radius is reduced by 4 metres per accumulated Token.
  • When a Survivor rescues the Obsession from the Hook, that Survivor will become the new Obsession.

You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.
"You have no idea what I have planned for you. It'll be in the news for weeks. I'll make sure of that." - The Ghost Face

To capture your prey, you must first extinguish their hope.
*Instead of snuffing Boon Totems<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> you destroy them.
*Destroying a ''Boon Totem'' this way reveals the Auras<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of all Survivors that were within its range at that moment for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">6</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">7</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">8</span>''' '''seconds'''.

To capture your prey, you must first extinguish their hope.
  • Instead of snuffing Boon Totems you destroy them.
  • Destroying a Boon Totem this way reveals the Auras of all Survivors that were within its range at that moment for 6/7/8 seconds.
"Nothing is permanent here. Nothing except our endless perdition." - Unknown, Notebook

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
<p>Whenever you are farther than '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">24 metres</span>''' from the Basement<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> while a Survivor enters it, ''Territorial Imperative'' activates:
*The Aura<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> of that Survivor is revealed to you for '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">4</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">5</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">6</span>''' '''seconds'''.


<p>''Territorial Imperative'' has a cool-down of '''<span class="luaClr clr clr6" style="color: #ff8800;">45 seconds</span>'''.

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.

Whenever you are farther than 24 metres from the Basement while a Survivor enters it, Territorial Imperative activates:

  • The Aura of that Survivor is revealed to you for 4/5/6 seconds.

Territorial Imperative has a cool-down of 45 seconds.

"We're not safe anywhere..."

Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.
* The Scratch Marks<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> left by Survivors<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 5px"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> spawn '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">slightly</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">moderately</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">considerably</span>''' closer together.

Your acute tracking ability allows you to hone in on disturbances left by running Survivors.
  • The Scratch Marks left by Survivors spawn slightly/moderately/considerably closer together.

"Never stop moving and hope you're always two steps ahead of the beast." - Unknown, Notebook

Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.

Upon gaining the '''''Bloodlust<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''', ''Beast of Prey'' activates:
* Grants the '''''Undetectable<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span>''''' '''Status Effect''' for as long as '''''Bloodlust''''' is active.
<p>''Beast of Prey'' grants '''<span class="luaClr clr clr2" style="color: #e8c252;">30</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr3" style="color: #199b1e;">40</span>'''/'''<span class="luaClr clr clr4" style="color: #ac3ee3;">50</span>''' '''%''' bonus Bloodpoints<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> for actions in the Hunter<span style = "padding: 0 0 0 0"><span style = "display:none" class = "pcView"><span class = "tooltip linkIncluded iconless borderless"><span class="tooltipBaseText"></span><span class = "tooltiptext"><span class="tooltipTextWrapper"></span></span></span></span><span class = "mobileView"></span></span> Category.

''The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded during the Trial.''

Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.

Upon gaining the Bloodlust Status Effect, Beast of Prey activates:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as Bloodlust is active.

Beast of Prey grants 30/40/50 % bonus Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter Category.
The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded during the Trial.
"Where did she go?"
